resource.name: Main Page
resource.key:
Welcome to '''miniWiki''' version {{$version}}, simple Wiki written in [http://www.php.net PHP] which uses [http://www.mysql.com MySQL] as its storage.
Login as [[User:admin|admin]] if you want to edit pages.
* [http://miniwiki.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/User%27s_Guide User's Guide] (external link) * [[Special:Users|List of All Users]] * [[Special:Pages|List of All Pages]] * [[Special:Uploads|List of All Uploads]]
If you did an upgrade from version older than 0.3 you most probably see this page instead of your own main page. From version 0.3 main page is called [[Main Page]], but do not worry, your old page is still on [[MainPage]], just copy its contents over here.

resource.name: User:admin
resource.key: Admin's password is ''admin''. Change it as soon as possible, please.
